mapper.select: SELECT oil_transport.*,company.company_name,company.address,company.county_id,county.COUNTY_NAME FROM oil_transport LEFT JOIN company ON oil_transport.company_id=company.com_id LEFT JOIN county ON company.county_id=county.COUNTY_ID where oil_transport.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into oil_transport (id, company_id, year, oil_type, scccode, source_discrip, year_volume, control_rate, emission, flag, note) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{oilType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yearVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{controlRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, oil_type = #{oilType,jdbcType=CHAR}, scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_volume = #{yearVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, control_rate = #{controlRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emission = #{emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update oil_transport
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
oil_type = #{oilType,jdbcType=CHAR},
scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year_volume = #{yearVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
control_rate = #{controlRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
emission = #{emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
